section.name: Using the Admin System
section.p: The website can be viewed as a tree with the home page as the root. The tree view can be viewed by clicking the tree link on the top right frame of a Page record within the Admin System.

subsection.name: Creating a new Record
subsection.p: Access the Admin System, where you can select Table you wish to add to from the dropdown.

ol.li: Fill in at least the items marked with a red *. [Leave the Deleted box unchecked.]

subsection.p: You have created a new record!
